newsitem.title: USA: Country World emerges from bankruptcy.
newsitem.headline: Country World emerges from bankruptcy.

text.p: Country World Casinos Inc said Wednesday it has emerged from bankruptcy, following a ruling from a federal bankruptcy court in Colorado.

Country World, a subsidiary of Holly Products Inc of Bala Cynwyd, Pa., said the court dismissed it from its pending bankruptcy case under Chapter 11 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code, subject submission and acceptance of a formal order by Country World's counsel.
It said the ruling frees it to pay its creditors and enter into financing deals so it can begin construction of its casino property in Black Hawk, Colo..

The ruling, issued after a hearing on March 3, also denied the motion of Tommy Knocker Casino Corporation and New Allied Development Corp to convert the case to a Chapter 7, or liquidation, proceeding, it said.
